title: Spacious 3 Bedroom in the Avon School District
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'A key to our Village unlocks pleasures great and small: a clubhouse soaked in sunlight; yoga and spin studio; pond with walking path, to name a few.', 'What’s more, your kids will love our playground, swimming pool, and expansive green space throughout the property.', 'Less than one mile to I-90, planning a trip to catch the Browns, Guardians or Cavaliers followed by dinner downtown is a breeze.', 'Find your bliss with so much space to call your own, here at The Village at Avon.', 'A homestyle townhome floorplan boasting private entry, front porch, attached, private 2-car garage and ample storage space.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'August 20, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', '$399 non-refundable fee per petPET RENT: $45/month (per pet, 2 max allowed); no weight limits, breed restrictions may apply.', 'Deposit:', '$399 and up with approved credit', 'Leasing options:', '9 months,9+ months,12 months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Lease terms of 7 thru 12 months available.', 'Pricing will vary by unit, move in date and flexible lease term.', 'Pricing and availability subject to change.', 'Application fee:', '$50 per adult', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'All utilities paid by resident', 'Utilities Cost:', 'Variable', 'Laundry:', 'Full size washer and dryer included in all units', 'Parking type:', 'Garage parking included with all townhomes', 'Parking notes:', 'Additional private garage space may be available for additional fee', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Microwave, Range/Oven, Ice maker', 'Exterior:', 'Front porch available with all townhome floorplans, Patios and sunrooms available on select floorplans, Balconies available on select 1 bedroom apartments', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Heat: forced air, Central AC, Ceiling fans', 'Wiring:', 'Cable-ready', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Clubhouse, Playground, Barbecue, Tennis court, Walking Trail, Dog Park, 24 hour fitness center, 24 hour yoga studio, Poolside sundeck with outdoor kitchen, Party room available for rent, Heated outdoor pool', 'Security and Access:', 'Private entry for townhomes, Controlled access for apartments, Secure package delivery via Amazon Hub', 'Views:', 'Wooded', 'Additional features:', 'Non-Smoking Property', 'Offered by:', 'The Village at Avon', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
